Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo was called for a foul on Hornets guard LaMelo Ball with the Bucks leading 114-113.
LaMelo Ball made two free throws to take the lead for the Hornets.
Giannis Antetokounmpo missed a potential game-winning jumper.
Post-Match Reflections: Crew chief Curtis Blair acknowledged that the leg-to-leg contact foul called on Antetokounmpo was incorrect.
Milwaukee Bucks head coach Doc Rivers expressed frustration over the officiating, leading to a $25,000 fine for public criticism.
